resources.string: How do I create a goal?
How do I edit a goal?
How do I remove a goal?
How do the bubbles signify goals?

Click the ‘+’ button on the bottom right corner of the main screen to create a new goal. Users can then input the name of their goal and rate the goal’s importance and difficulty on a scale of 0-5, with 5 being the most important or difficult. Users can include a description of the goal as well. Once the page is filled out, click the ‘Add Goal’ button and the goal will be added as a bubble on the main screen.
Users can click on a bubble to see its name, and click the edit button to update the goal.
Users can long click on a bubble to delete it.
The color and size of the bubble will illustrate the goal’s importance and difficulty rating. The larger and darker the bubble equates with a higher the importance and difficulty rating.
